hibernate-mapping.query: select new oidto( o.Id,o.Acctno,o.LNo,o.M1,o.M2,o.M3,o.M4,o.M5,o.M6,o.M7,o.M8,o.M9,o.M10,o.M11,o.M12,o.P1Status,o.P2Status,o.P3Status,o.P4Status,o.LastDate,o.LastInt,o.UserNo,o.ACSign,o.CloseDate,o.Budget,o.TODCloseDate,o.UId,o.SourceBr,o.Cur ) from MNMORM00008 as o where ( o.Acctno =: acctno or o.M1 =: m1 or o.M2 =: m2 or o.M3 =: m3 or o.M4 =: m4 or o.M5 =: m5 or o.M6 =: m6 or o.M7 =: m7 or o.M8 =: m8 or o.M9 =: m9 or o.M10 =: m10 or o.M11 =: m11 or o.M12 =: m12 or o.LastInt =: lastInt ) and o.Active = true

select new oidto( o.Id, o.Acctno, o.LNo, o.M1, o.M2, o.M3, o.M4, o.M5, o.M6, o.M7, o.M8, o.M9, o.M10, o.M11, o.M12, o.P1Status, o.P2Status, o.P3Status, o.P4Status, o.LastDate, o.LastInt, o.UserNo, o.ACSign, o.CloseDate, o.Budget, o.TODCloseDate, o.UId, o.SourceBr, o.Cur, o.Active, o.TS, o.CreatedDate, o.CreatedUserId, o.UpdatedUserId, o.UpdatedDate ) from MNMORM00008 as o where o.Active = true and o.SourceBr=:SourceBranchCode

update MNMORM00008 o set o.M1=:month, o.M2=:month, o.M3=:month, o.M4=:month, o.M5=:month, o.M6=:month, o.M7=:month, o.M8=:month, o.M9=:month, o.M10=:month, o.M11=:month, o.M12=:month, o.Budget=:budget, o.UpdatedDate=:updatedDate, o.UpdatedUserId=:updatedUserId where o.SourceBr=:SourceBranchCode and o.Active = true
select o.Cur from MNMORM00008 as o where (o.CloseDate != null and o.CloseDate != '') and o.Active = true group by o.Cur

select new oidto( o.Id, o.Acctno, o.LNo, o.M1, o.M2, o.M3, o.M4, o.M5, o.M6, o.M7, o.M8, o.M9, o.M10, o.M11, o.M12, o.P1Status, o.P2Status, o.P3Status, o.P4Status, o.LastDate, o.LastInt, o.UserNo, o.ACSign, o.CloseDate, o.Budget, o.TODCloseDate, o.UId, o.SourceBr, o.Cur, o.Active, o.TS, o.CreatedDate, o.CreatedUserId, o.UpdatedUserId, o.UpdatedDate ) from MNMORM00008 as o where o.Acctno =: accountNo and o.SourceBr = :sourceBr and o.Active = true and (o.CloseDate = null or o.CloseDate = '') order by CreatedDate desc

select new oidto( o.Id, o.Acctno, o.LNo, o.M1, o.M2, o.M3, o.M4, o.M5, o.M6, o.M7, o.M8, o.M9, o.M10, o.M11, o.M12, o.P1Status, o.P2Status, o.P3Status, o.P4Status, o.LastDate, o.LastInt, o.UserNo, o.ACSign, o.CloseDate, o.Budget, o.TODCloseDate, o.UId, o.SourceBr, o.Cur, o.Active, o.TS, o.CreatedDate, o.CreatedUserId, o.UpdatedUserId, o.UpdatedDate ) from MNMORM00008 as o where o.Acctno =: accountNo and o.LNo = :lno and o.SourceBr = :sourceBr and o.Active = true and (o.CloseDate = null or o.CloseDate = '')

select new oidto( o.Id, o.Acctno, o.LNo, o.M1, o.M2, o.M3, o.M4, o.M5, o.M6, o.M7, o.M8, o.M9, o.M10, o.M11, o.M12, o.P1Status, o.P2Status, o.P3Status, o.P4Status, o.LastDate, o.LastInt, o.UserNo, o.ACSign, o.CloseDate, o.Budget, o.TODCloseDate, o.UId, o.SourceBr, o.Cur, o.Active, o.TS, o.CreatedDate, o.CreatedUserId, o.UpdatedUserId, o.UpdatedDate ) from MNMORM00008 as o where o.LNo = :lno and o.SourceBr = :sourceBr and o.Active = true and (o.CloseDate = null or o.CloseDate = '')
